overview: The heroes of the film are a pathologist and his work. This is a favorite work, where everything is arranged for life. Book racks, a selection of music gourmet discs: Tom Waits, The Rolling Stones, etc. On the walls of the picture are oil paintings with views of the morgue. No cynicism - professionalism, humor and the realized dream of a man who, since childhood, dreams of understanding why a person actually dies.

production_companies.name: M. Razbezhkina and M. Ugarov Academy

title: Morphology
